name: sturdy

effect.sword_shield: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.legends_arceus: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.

short_effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

flavor_text.sword_shield: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
